name: Heathen Treasure
description: "Heathen Treasure", is an educational puzzle game, where you explore your way through the nordic village of Burs. It was done by a team of 7 Game Design students, as part of a game jam focused on bringing attention to the historical significance of the place.  You will be transported between different timelines, in which you will encounter different artifacts and structures, left over from the age of Vikings. It tells the story of the village, the monuments, and the Vikings that lived there.
